Description: This isn't a complete fix for #54, but it is a step forward, as it allows users to safely do: ```js import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components'; import { global } from '@storybook/design-system'; const CustomGlobalStyle = createGlobalStylebody {      ${global.bodyStyles}    } } ``` In their own code to avoid the @import.
